a.title: Learn more about Deerfield Community School District
a.span: Go to Deerfield Community School District Information

div.h1: Welcome to the Deerfield School District
div.p: Home to 775 students, Deerfield Community School District is located 15 miles east of Madison, Wisconsin's state capital. Deerfield students enjoy small class sizes, hands-on learning experiences, and many opportunities for participation in extracurricular athletics and activities. Our active parent organizations encourage involvement and support in our schools. Our caring staff and supportive parents and community make Deerfield Schools a great place for our students to learn and grow!

h3.var: Committed to Excellence and Equity in Education

li.a: Free lunch for students 18 and under

div.a: View All Updates

div.p: Online store is now open to place orders for next school year. Deerfield's account number is 7180. Remember to select what grade your child(ren) will be entering this FALL. Deadline to order is May 1.

div.div: Free Online Mindfulness Classes for Kids

div.h2: Free Online Mindfulness Classes for Kids
div.p: With many students, educators, and families at home, away from school and work, Mindful Schools is excited to offer free, online mindfulness classes for KIDS! Your kids can join us online for mindful activities, mindful movement, read-alouds, and more. Classes are held every...
